FFI-based Lua API for ngx_http_lua_module and/or ngx_stream_lua_module contained in lua-nginx-module (i.e. OpenResty).

Works with luapower’s build of nginx which bundles lua-nginx-module.

It’s complete documentation is at https://github.com/openresty/lua-resty-core/tree/v0.1.17

NOTE: this module must only be upgraded together with lua-nginx-module.
